abstract: Stockholders of Compass, the catering company, are to receive a further 500 million pound ($991 million) payout as a result of the company’s sale of its Selecta vending business for 772.5 million pounds to the private equity arm of Allianz.
lead_paragraph: Stockholders of Compass, the catering company, are to receive a further 500 million pound ($991 million) payout as a result of the company’s sale of its Selecta vending business for 772.5 million pounds to the private equity arm of Allianz.

headline.main: Compass Sells Vending Unit to Allianz
